plham

Class IndexMarket

  • plham.Market
    • plham.IndexMarket

  • public class IndexMarket
extends Market
    IndexMarket is for a market (asset) associated with some underlying markets (assets). E.g., index-futures, exchange-traded funds, and derivatives.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class plham.Market

        Market.AgentUpdate, Market.ExecutionLog, Market.MarketEvent, Market.OrderEvent
